This t-shirt design admires Tazio Nuvolari , one of the world's best ever grand prix drivers.

He was one of the first, if not the first to master the four-wheel drift.

He didnt start racing until he was 27, starting with motorcycle racing, he won the 350cc European Championship, then went on to concentrate solely on grand prix racing, driving for Alfa Corse, Maserati, Ferrari and Auto Union. World War II interupted his career, but he returned afterwards when he was 54 and won his final race in 1950.

He was a a true legend and was admired by many.. after his death in 1953 up to 50,000 people attended his funeral and his procession was a mile long. His coffin was placed on a car chassis which was pushed by Alberto Ascari, Luigi Villoresi and Juan Manuel Fangio.
